verses.roman:
ananta caitanya-līlā nā yāya likhana
diṅ-mātra dekhāñā tāhā kariye sūcana

synonyms: ananta—endless; caitanya-līlā—the pastimes of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nā yāya likhana—it is impossible to write; dik-mātra—only a direction; dekhāñā—showing; tāhā—them; kariye sūcana—I introduce.
translation: The pastimes of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu are unlimited; it is not possible to write of them properly. I can only give an indication of them as I try to introduce them.
